author: Nintendo of America
description:
Disney Dreamlight Valley’s latest update is now available on Nintendo Switch: https://ninten.do/6058svp0Q 
 
Help Disney's Lumiere and Cogsworth with their castle-keeping as you uncover the mystery behind the strange happenings in the Beauty and the Beast Realm. Tidy up the place and celebrate with a masquerade ball! Once the job is done, bring Lumiere and Cogsworth back to your Valley and reunite them with Disney's Belle and Beast.
 
Get ready for witchy season with the Witchful Thinking Star Path! Celebrate all things eerie and discover your inner witch to unlock chilling decorations, supernatural accessories, and spellbinding costumes.
 
#NintendoSwitch #DisneyDreamlightValley
title: Disney Dreamlight Valley – Return to Beast's Castle Update Trailer – Nintendo Switch
